segments.text: Here you are . You left the medicine here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I firmly believe that you love your brother very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . By the way , do you sell any traditional Chinese medicine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have some Chinese medicine for common cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard Chinese medicine has a better lasting effect in cure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It depends . It's true that you can take some for prevention .
segments.speaker: S1
